name: Yohualtecuhtin, Lord of the Night
desc: An angel who created the Night Kingdom in Natlan.

customize.name: Angels
customize.desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

customize.text: Lord of the Night is an envoy of heaven.

customize.name: Ronova
customize.desc: The Ruler of Death, one of the Primordial One's Shades.

customize.text: Under the Ruler of Death's guidance, the Lord of the Night created the Night Kingdom.

customize.name: Night Kingdom
customize.desc: The Lord of the Night designed a realm of souls and memories to recreate the damaged Ley Lines in Natlan. The Night Kingdom is a mysterious, liminal space between the body and mind, life and death, where the souls of all the dead Natlanese go.

customize.text: During the war of the Heavenly Principles and the dragons, Natlan's Ley Lines were severely damaged. To reconstruct them, Yohualtecuhtin reassembled the yet-intact components into a new structure and created the Night Kingdom, which stores all the memories and souls of Natlan.

customize.name: Il Capitano
customize.desc: The First of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers and the Sentinel Knight of Khaenri'ah. His real name is Thrain.

customize.text: The Captain merged with the Lord of the Night to restore and change the Ley Lines in Natlan. Because of his immortality, the Night Kingdom can exist forever.

customize.name: Pilgrim's Chronicle
customize.desc:
Obtained from the Lord of the Night, this material plays a key role in the creation of Ancient Names. Its essence is "memory," for Natlan's Ley Lines do not record the adventures of outsiders, and so, a special "vessel" is needed here.

Memory flows within this receptacle, and if you focus on its surface, it will display the vital footprints you have left in Natlan.

From what you've heard, Xilonen and Citlali had a rather easy time obtaining this material. This, you presume, is thanks to the Lord of the Night's gentleness and generosity.

imgDesc.text: Angels are protecting Irminsul from the dragon's fire.
